research.title: 未來食物新浪潮：韓國微壽司 — 米粒大小的壽司
research.summary: 韓國延世大學研究團隊研發了富含蛋白質的「微牛肉壽司」，直接用牛肉細胞包裹米粒，創造出永續的替代性蛋白質食物。每100公克微壽司相當於100克米和1克牛肉的營養價值。

data-analysis.title: YouTube Data Analysis and Visualization
data-analysis.summary: This is the index page for the YouTube data analysis series, introducing the motivation, dataset, and links to other analysis articles in the series.

data-analysis.title: US YouTube Trending Video Analysis
data-analysis.summary: An analysis of US YouTube trending video data using R, exploring the relationships between views, likes, dislikes, and comments, and identifying top trending channels.

data-analysis.title: Canada YouTube Trending Video Analysis
data-analysis.summary: An analysis of Canadian YouTube trending video data using R, comparing the findings with US data to identify similarities and differences in video trends.
